name: White Room _ Puzzle Adventure Game
description:
Game I created as part of a graduate project at SCAD. Most of the art and sound content was made using found assets. I created all of the code featured in this game, as well as a few 3D models. You can try out and download the game below. Only available for windows.

Software Used : Unreal Engine 4, Maya, Substance Painter, Photoshop
